Package br.com.kirgh.app

package br.com.kirgh.app
This package contains all packages and the main class for running the KIRGH Energy REST application.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    br.com.kirgh.app.controllers
    This package contains all REST controller classes that handle HTTP requests to manipulate the defined entities.
    br.com.kirgh.app.dtos
    This package contains all packages and the main class for running the KIRGH Energy REST application.
    br.com.kirgh.app.entities
    This package contains all entities that generate the business tables for the application.
    br.com.kirgh.app.enums
    This package contains all enum classes that define constants for use as entity attributes and validation.
    br.com.kirgh.app.exceptions
    This package contains all classes to handle expected or not exceptions from code or client requests.
    br.com.kirgh.app.mappers
    This package contains all classes that map each property of a DTO with the same properties of an entity.
    br.com.kirgh.app.pks
    This package contains all classes that define the relation between two tables in order to achieve the Third Normal Form.
    br.com.kirgh.app.repositories
    This package contains all repository classes for encapsulating storage (e.g.: insert, update, delete and select data).
    br.com.kirgh.app.services
    This package contains all service classes for encapsulating business definitions and data exceptions.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    KirghEnergyApplication
    This is the main class for running KIRGH Energy REST application in Java.
